```{r, echo = FALSE, out.width = '100%'}

    "IMG/clusterProfiler.GeneRatio.BgRatio.png"
  )
)
```
  
**`r fig_nums(name = "GeneRatioNBgRatio", caption = "GeneRatio & BgRatio in clusterProfiler")`** GeneRatio = $\frac{M}{N}$ & BgRatio = $\frac{k}{n}$
